description:
Luffy and Nami ask to borrow a ship so they can chase down the sea train, but the weather is too severe to set sail. Lucky for them, Iceberg and his friends are full of surprises!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Another Sea Train? Rocketman Charges Forth!
Mouhitotsu no Umi Ressha! Rocketman Shutsugeki
Un autre train des mers ? Le départ du Rocketman !
قطار بحريّ آخر؟ يتقدّم قطار الرّجل الصّارخ للأمام
もう一つの海列車! ロケットマン出撃
